verses.verse: (A Maskil of Ethan the Ezrahite.) I will sing <S%H7891><s%> of the lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> To all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%> I will make <S%H3045><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> Thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> with my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

For I have said, <S%H559><s%> "Lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> will be built <S%H1129><s%> up forever; <S%H5769><s%> In the heavens <S%H8064><s%> Thou wilt establish <S%H3559><s%> Thy faithfulness. <S%H530><s%>"
"I have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with My chosen; <S%H972><s%> I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> My servant, <S%H5650><s%>

I will establish <S%H3559><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> And build <S%H1129><s%> up your throne <S%H3678><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%> "Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

And the heavens <S%H8064><s%> will praise <S%H3034><s%> Thy wonders, <S%H6382><s%> O Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> also <S%H637><s%> in the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the holy <S%H6918><s%> ones. <S%H6918><s%>

For who <S%H4310><s%> in the skies <S%H7834><s%> is comparable <S%H6186><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%>? Who among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the mighty <S%H410><s%> is like <S%H1819><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%>

A God <S%H410><s%> greatly <S%H7227><s%> feared <S%H6206><s%> in the council <S%H5475><s%> of the holy <S%H6918><s%> ones, <S%H6918><s%> And awesome <S%H3372><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> those who are around <S%H5439><s%> Him?

O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> is like <S%H3644><s%> Thee, O mighty <S%H2626><s%> Lord <S%H3050><s%>? Thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> also surrounds <S%H5439><s%> Thee.
Thou dost rule <S%H4910><s%> the swelling <S%H1348><s%> of the sea; <S%H3220><s%> When its waves <S%H1530><s%> rise, <S%H5375><s%> Thou dost still <S%H7623><s%> them.

Thou Thyself <S%H859><s%> didst crush <S%H1792><s%> Rahab <S%H7293><s%> like one who is slain; <S%H2491><s%> Thou didst scatter <S%H6340><s%> Thine enemies <S%H340><s%> with Thy mighty <S%H5797><s%> arm. <S%H2220><s%>
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> are Thine, the earth <S%H776><s%> also <S%H637><s%> is Thine; The world <S%H8398><s%> and all <S%H4393><s%> it contains, <S%H4393><s%> Thou hast founded <S%H3245><s%> them.

The north <S%H6828><s%> and the south, <S%H3225><s%> Thou hast created <S%H1254><s%> them; Tabor <S%H8396><s%> and Hermon <S%H2768><s%> shout <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%> at Thy name. <S%H8034><s%>
Thou hast a strong <S%H1369><s%> arm; <S%H2220><s%> Thy hand <S%H3027><s%> is mighty, <S%H5810><s%> Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> is exalted. <S%H7311><s%>

Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and justice <S%H4941><s%> are the foundation <S%H4349><s%> of Thy throne; <S%H3678><s%> Lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> go <S%H6923><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thee.

How blessed <S%H835><s%> are the people <S%H5971><s%> who know <S%H3045><s%> the joyful <S%H8643><s%> sound! <S%H8643><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> they walk <S%H1980><s%> in the light <S%H216><s%> of Thy countenance. <S%H6440><s%>
In Thy name <S%H8034><s%> they rejoice <S%H1523><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day, <S%H3117><s%> And by Thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> they are exalted. <S%H7311><s%>
For Thou art the glory <S%H8597><s%> of their strength, <S%H5797><s%> And by Thy favor <S%H7522><s%> our horn <S%H7161><s%> is exalted. <S%H7311><s%>
For our shield <S%H4043><s%> belongs to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And our king <S%H4428><s%> to the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Once <S%H227><s%> Thou didst speak <S%H1696><s%> in vision <S%H2377><s%> to Thy godly <S%H2623><s%> ones, <S%H2623><s%> And didst say, <S%H559><s%> "I have given <S%H7737><s%> help <S%H5828><s%> to one who <S%H1368><s%> is mighty; <S%H1368><s%> I have exalted <S%H7311><s%> one chosen <S%H977><s%> from the people. <S%H5971><s%>
"I have found <S%H4672><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> My servant; <S%H5650><s%> With My holy <S%H6944><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> I have anointed <S%H4886><s%> him,
With whom <S%H834><s%> My hand <S%H3027><s%> will be established; <S%H3559><s%> My arm <S%H2220><s%> also <S%H637><s%> will strengthen <S%H553><s%> him.
"The enemy <S%H340><s%> will not deceive <S%H5377><s%> him, Nor <S%H3808><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of wickedness <S%H9390><s%> afflict <S%H6031><s%> him.
"But I shall crush <S%H3807><s%> his adversaries <S%H6862><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, And strike <S%H5062><s%> those who hate <S%H8130><s%> him.
"And My faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and My lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> will be with him, And in My name <S%H8034><s%> his horn <S%H7161><s%> will be exalted. <S%H7311><s%>
"I shall also set <S%H7760><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> on the sea, <S%H3220><s%> And his right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> on the rivers. <S%H5104><s%>
"He will cry <S%H7121><s%> to Me, 'Thou art my Father, My God, <S%H1><s%> and the rock <S%H410><s%> of my salvation. <S%H6697><s%>'
"I also <S%H637><s%> shall make <S%H5414><s%> him [My] first-born, The highest <S%H5945><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
"My lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> I will keep <S%H8104><s%> for him forever, <S%H5769><s%> And My covenant <S%H1285><s%> shall be confirmed <S%H539><s%> to him.
"So I will establish <S%H7760><s%> his descendants <S%H2233><s%> forever, <S%H5703><s%> And his throne <S%H3678><s%> as the days <S%H3117><s%> of heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
"If <S%H518><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> My law, <S%H8451><s%> And do not walk <S%H1980><s%> in My judgments, <S%H4941><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> they violate <S%H2490><s%> My statutes, <S%H2708><s%> And do not keep <S%H8104><s%> My commandments, <S%H4687><s%>
Then I will visit <S%H6485><s%> their transgression <S%H6588><s%> with the rod, <S%H7626><s%> And their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> with stripes. <S%H5061><s%>
"But I will not break <S%H6565><s%> off My lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> from him, Nor <S%H3808><s%> deal <S%H8266><s%> falsely <S%H8266><s%> in My faithfulness. <S%H530><s%>
"My covenant <S%H1285><s%> I will not violate, <S%H2490><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> will I alter <S%H8132><s%> the utterance <S%H4161><s%> of My lips. <S%H8193><s%>
"Once <S%H259><s%> I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> by My holiness; <S%H6944><s%> I will not lie <S%H3576><s%> to David. <S%H1732><s%>
"His descendants <S%H2233><s%> shall endure <S%H1961><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> And his throne <S%H3678><s%> as the sun <S%H8121><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> Me.
"It shall be established <S%H3559><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> like the moon, <S%H3394><s%> And the witness <S%H5707><s%> in the sky <S%H7834><s%> is faithful. <S%H539><s%>" Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

But Thou hast cast <S%H2186><s%> off <S%H2186><s%> and rejected, <S%H3988><s%> Thou hast been <S%H9378><s%> full <S%H9378><s%> of wrath <S%H9378><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Thine anointed. <S%H4899><s%>
Thou hast spurned <S%H5010><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Thy servant; <S%H5650><s%> Thou hast profaned <S%H2490><s%> his crown <S%H5145><s%> in the dust. <S%H776><s%>
Thou hast broken <S%H6555><s%> down <S%H6555><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his walls; <S%H1448><s%> Thou hast brought <S%H7760><s%> his strongholds <S%H4013><s%> to ruin. <S%H4288><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> who pass <S%H5674><s%> along <S%H5674><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> plunder <S%H8155><s%> him; He has <S%H1961><s%> become <S%H1961><s%> a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to his neighbors. <S%H7934><s%>
Thou hast exalted <S%H7311><s%> the right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> of his adversaries; <S%H6862><s%> Thou hast made all <S%H3605><s%> his enemies <S%H340><s%> rejoice. <S%H8055><s%>
Thou dost also <S%H637><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> the edge <S%H6864><s%> of his sword, <S%H2719><s%> And hast not made him stand <S%H6965><s%> in battle. <S%H4421><s%>
Thou hast made his splendor <S%H9184><s%> to cease, <S%H7673><s%> And cast <S%H4048><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>
Thou hast shortened <S%H9527><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his youth; <S%H5934><s%> Thou hast covered <S%H5844><s%> him with shame. <S%H955><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

How <S%H4100><s%> long, <S%H5704><s%> O Lord <S%H3068><s%>? Wilt Thou hide <S%H5641><s%> Thyself forever <S%H5331><s%>? Will Thy wrath <S%H2534><s%> burn <S%H1197><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>?

Remember <S%H2142><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> my span <S%H2465><s%> of life <S%H2465><s%> is; For what <S%H4100><s%> vanity <S%H7723><s%> Thou hast created <S%H1254><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>

What <S%H4310><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> can live <S%H2421><s%> and not see <S%H7200><s%> death <S%H4194><s%>? Can he deliver <S%H4422><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from the power <S%H3027><s%> of Sheol <S%H7585><s%>? Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Where <S%H346><s%> are Thy former <S%H7223><s%> lovingkindnesses, <S%H2617><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> Which Thou didst swear <S%H7650><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> in Thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%>?

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of Thy servants; <S%H5650><s%> How I do bear <S%H5375><s%> in my bosom <S%H2436><s%> [the reproach of] all <S%H3605><s%> the many <S%H7227><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%>

With which <S%H834><s%> Thine enemies <S%H340><s%> have reproached, <S%H2778><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> With which <S%H834><s%> they have reproached <S%H2778><s%> the footsteps <S%H6119><s%> of Thine anointed. <S%H4899><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord <S%H3068><s%> forever! <S%H5769><s%> Amen <S%H543><s%> and Amen. <S%H543><s%>
